Method Detail

getOutput

public void getOutput(double[] input_value,
                      double[] wieght,
                      double[] output)
Calculate the output of the NN.

Parameters:
input_value - The input values to the NN. The input of the NN will be normalised in a range of [-Math.sqrt(3), Math.sqrt(3)].
wieght - The weights of the NN. To ensure that this is possible the input values must be in the range [0, 1].
output - The output of the NN will be stored in this array.

getHLOutput

public void getHLOutput(double[] hiddenOutput)
Get the output from the Hidden Layer. This should only be called once the output to the NN has been calculated.

Parameters:
hiddenOutput - The output of the NN's HL is stored in this array.
